title: Cis journalists stop putting trans people’s existence up for debate
description: Just over two-thirds of Americans say they don’t personally know a trans person. I couldn’t stop thinking about that statistic throughout the past year, witnessing the escalation of efforts to push trans people out of public life under a federal government employing executive orders and court decisions to further marginalize trans people from accessing various...
